OUTLINE : This multicenter study . - Chemoradiotherapy ( CRT ) : Patients receive fluorouracil IV continuously day 1-38 ; cisplatin IV 1 hour day 1 , 8 , 15 , 22 , 29 , 36 ; interferon alfa subcutaneously day 1 , 3 , 5 , 8 , 10 , 12 , 15 , 17 , 19 , 22 , 24 , 26 , 29 , 31 , 33 , 36 , 38 . Patients also undergo radiotherapy day 1-5 , 8-12 , 15-19 , 22-26 , 29-33 , 36-38 . - Post-CRT chemotherapy : Beginning 4-6 week completion CRT , patient receive fluorouracil IV continuously day 1-42 . Treatment repeat every 56 day total two course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 2 month 2 year , every 3 month 1 year , every 4 month 1 year , every 6 month 1 year , annually thereafter .
